headline: Anonymous
pros: Collegial work environment with generally collaborative, smart employees. Flat organization and no bureaucracy. Opportunities for good employees throughout the organization to take on significant responsibilities. Very knowledgeable analysts. Good work-life balance.
cons: Typical small firm struggles. Tough to limit turnover among top performers, given compensation constraints. Difficult to establish and maintain talent depth. Competitive landscape that is overly saturated. Long sales cycles common, and new business can be tough to come by.
